title: Halloween 30 Watch Faces Pack
summary: Enjoy Halloween with these funny and scary set of 30 watch faces pack.
description: Choose between different themes : pumpkins (jack-o'-lantern, happy, scary, freaky, joker, …), moons, asteroids, witches, bats, skulls, monsters (like Frankenstein).Fun and cool set of 30 interactive Halloween watch faces.Includes three packages of Halloween watch faces: "mix", "moons" and "pumpkins" .It is designed for all types of watches, both round and square.After installing the application on Android Wear you could select the watch face set of "Halloween Mix", "Halloween Moons" or "Halloween Pumpkins".Features:* Three packages with themes Halloween Mix, Halloween Moons and Halloween Pumpkins.* Includes 30 different watch faces (10 mix, 10 moons and 10 pumpkins).* Interactive watch faces: tap to change the current watch face to the next.* Available for all kind of watches (compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches,…).* Designed for round and square watches.* Energy saving management with the ambient mode to save & increase the battery life.* Compatible with Android 6 (Marshmallow).Halloween Watch Face for Android Wear, trick or treat ?
descriptionHTML:
Choose between different themes : pumpkins (jack-o'-lantern, happy, scary, freaky, joker, …), moons, asteroids, witches, bats, skulls, monsters (like Frankenstein).

Fun and cool set of 30 interactive Halloween watch faces.

Includes three packages of Halloween watch faces: "mix", "moons" and "pumpkins" .

It is designed for all types of watches, both round and square.

After installing the application on Android Wear you could select the watch face set of "Halloween Mix", "Halloween Moons" or "Halloween Pumpkins".

Features:

* Three packages with themes Halloween Mix, Halloween Moons and Halloween Pumpkins.
* Includes 30 different watch faces (10 mix, 10 moons and 10 pumpkins).
* Interactive watch faces: tap to change the current watch face to the next.
* Available for all kind of watches (compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches,…).
* Designed for round and square watches.
* Energy saving management with the ambient mode to save & increase the battery life.
* Compatible with Android 6 (Marshmallow).

Halloween Watch Face for Android Wear, trick or treat ?
comments: Needs improving but good Love the themes but would like the option of adding watch battery status and date.
recentChanges: -Added a padlock to block the watch face change (upper right corner).
